page.title: 14LOCAL SHOPS
page.content: A FEW FRIENDS AND I WENT TO FOUR LOCAL SHOPS:{A GREENGROCER'S, AN ESTATE {AGENT, A NEWSAGENT AND A GROCER'S. THESE SHOPS ARE SCATTERED ABOUT THE AREA, ALL ON MAIN ROADS.{BROGDEN'S}IN ASTLEY OPENED IN FEB '82. THE MANAGER OWNS FOUR LOCAL{ESTATE AGENTS}WHICH SELL{HOUSES}AND{COMMERCIAL BUILDINGS. THE ASTLEY OFFICE IS MOST FREQUENTLY VISITED ON MONDAYS AND FRIDAYS. HOUSE BUYERS OF ALL AGES VISIT THIS OFFICE. {QUINN'S NEWSAGENTS}IS VERY POPULAR AND HAS BEEN OPEN FOR SIX YEARS. THE SERVICE THERE IS VERY GOOD. THEY MOSTLY SELL TOBACCO, SWEETS AND NEWSPAPERS. THERE ARE FOUR PEOPLE WORKING THERE INCLUDING MR QUINN. THE OTHER TWO SHOPS ARE{JONES' ,A GENERAL {GROCERY STORE,}AND{MASON'S}WHICH IS A {FRUIT AND VEGETABLE SHOP.
